snippet: The Benetton family plans to delist the Italian fashion chain that bears its name by buying the shares it does not already own, as retailers across Europe struggle with falling earnings and weak consumer spending.
abstract: The Benetton family plans to delist the Italian fashion chain that bears its name by buying the shares it does not already own, as retailers across Europe struggle with falling earnings and weak consumer spending.

headline.main: Benetton Family Looks to Take Retailer Private
